name: PSG CORDYS Cloud Computing Laboratory
body: PSG College of Technology which is one among the pioneers in Engineering education in our country signs a Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) with Cordys, the global provider of software for business process innovation and Enterprise Cloud Orchestration, Headquartered in the Netherlands. As a result Cordys have collaboratively setup a Computing Lab entitled “PSG-CORDYS SOA and Cloud Computing Laboratory” at Department of Computer Science and Engineering and was inaugurated by Dr.R.Rudramoorthy Principal PSG College of Technology on 17th Feb 2010 @ 9am.

name: PSG - Cordys Service Oriented Architecture Laboratory
body: PSG College of Technology which is one among the pioneers in Engineering education in our country and Cordys, Hyderabad, the fastest growing BPMS, multinational company span over 5 countries are coming together to nurture Business Process Management Suite (BPMS) and Service Oriented Architecture (SOA) to the academic community. A Memorandum of Understanding is signed between these two iconic organizations on 8.8.2007 at the premises of PSG College of Technology Coimbatore. PSG College of Technology will setup a Computing Lab entitled “PSG-CORDYS SOA Laboratory” at Department of Computer Science and Engineering. Under this collaboration, the lab is to be equipped with State of art Hardware and Software product of CORDYS.
